i1.name: A_Harmless_Scarecrow
description: {{sbc|Innate - Scarecrow Effigy:}} '''Fiddlesticks''' begins the game with an exclusive {{ii|Scarecrow Effigy}}, which permanently occupies the [[Trinket item|trinket]] slot. '''Fiddlesticks''' can pretend to be an ''Effigy'' by standing still and not acting nor being acted upon for 2 seconds, during which it adjusts its body into a scarecrow and extends its arm out to expose its lantern.

{{sbc|Innate - A Harmless Scarecrow:}} From [[Experience (champion)|level]] 6 onward, placing an {{tip|Effigy}} also summons a demonic eyeball at the location that grants {{tip|obscured vision}} of enemy units that are not {{tip|sight|visible}} in the area for 6 seconds while also {{tip|true sight|revealing}} and {{tip|disabled ward|disabling}} enemy {{tip|ward|wards}} and {{tip|stealthed trap|stealthed traps}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Scarecrow Effigy: Fiddlesticks begins the game with an exclusive Scarecrow Effigy, which permanently occupies the Trinket item slot. Fiddlesticks can pretend to be an Effigy by standing still and not acting nor being acted upon for 2 seconds, during which it adjusts its body into a scarecrow and extends its arm out to expose its lantern.
Innate - A Harmless Scarecrow: From Experience (champion) 6 onward, placing an Effigy also summons a demonic eyeball at the location that grants obscured vision of enemy units that are not visible in the area for 6 seconds while also revealing and disabling enemy wards and stealthed traps.
i1.notes:
* {{ii|Scarecrow Effigy|Scarecrow Effigies}} are unavailable on [[ARAM]] until '''Fiddlesticks''' uses its {{ii|Poro-Snax}}.
* The process of or the act of pretending to be an ''Effigy'' will be interrupted if '''Fiddlesticks''':
** Moves.
** Takes damage.
** Declares an attack.
** Casts any ability or spell.
** Starts {{tip|channel|channeling}}.
** Is hit by an ability.
** Is affected by a {{tip|crowd control}} effect.
* ''Effigies'' will mimic '''Fiddlesticks' ''' idle animations and their [[health bar]]s are hidden until they fake an action.
** If '''Fiddlesticks''' pretends to be an ''Effigy'', its health bar stays hidden until the pose is interrupted.
* Effigies are considered {{tip|clone|clones}}.
** They are not valid targets to [[direction-targeted|direction]], [[ground-targeted|ground]], and [[auto-targeted]] effects for first {{tt|{{fd|1.5}} seconds|Estimated}} of their lifespan.
* The trinket slot can still be temporarily replaced by {{ii|Eye of the Herald}}.
* [[File:A Harmless Scarecrow Surprise Party.png|30px|border]] - {{csl|Fiddlesticks|Surprise Party}} has a special icon for this ability.

q1.name: Terrify
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} While '''Fiddlesticks''' has been [[combat status|out of combat]] for at least {{tt|{{fd|2.5}} seconds|Estimated}} and is not {{tip|sight|visible}} to the enemy team, or is pretending to be an {{ai|A Harmless Scarecrow|Fiddlesticks|Effigy}}, the next damaging ability will additionally {{tip|fear}} targets hit.
Targets feared by '''Fiddlesticks''' are placed on a cooldown equal to ''Terrify's'' cooldown, during which they cannot be feared by it again.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Fiddlesticks''' launches a crow at the target enemy that deals {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|fear|fears}} them for a duration. ''Terrify'' has a minimum damage threshold and is capped at 400 against {{tip|monsters}}.
Against targets with a cooldown, ''Terrify'' instead will have its {{ccs|damage|magic}} and minimum threshold doubled.
{{tip|minion|Minions}} are always feared if '''Fiddlesticks''' is not attacking them and there is no enemy champion in its view.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: While Fiddlesticks has been combat status for at least 2.5 seconds and is not visible to the enemy team, or is pretending to be an Fiddlesticks's Effigy, the next damaging ability will additionally fear targets hit.
Targets feared by Fiddlesticks are placed on a cooldown equal to Terrify's cooldown, during which they cannot be feared by it again.
Active: Fiddlesticks launches a crow at the target enemy that deals magic damage and fears them for a duration. Terrify has a minimum damage threshold and is capped at 400 against monsters.
Against targets with a cooldown, Terrify instead will have its Unknown value: ccs / damage / magic and minimum threshold doubled.
Minions are always feared if Fiddlesticks is not attacking them and there is no enemy champion in its view.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|6 to 10}}% {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''current''' health}}|Minimum Damage|{{ap|40 to 120}}}}
{{st|Increased Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|6*2 to 10*2}}% {{as|(+ 4% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''current''' health}}|Increased Minimum Damage|{{ap|40*2 to 120*2}}}}
q1.notes:
* The fear-immunity timer is not refreshed by subsequent attempts to fear the target.
* The {{tip|fear}} is applied {{tt|at the end of the cast time|0.363 seconds after the start of cast, due game tick rate}}, regardless of the target's distance or the missile landing.
** The missile cannot be destroyed, either.
* '''Fiddlesticks''' is considered "seen" if it is visible and is inside an enemy champion's {{tt|sight radius|1350 units}}. Vision from {{tip|minion|minions}}, {{tip|ward|wards}}, and {{tip|turret|turrets}} will not prevent '''Fiddlesticks''' from {{tip|flee|fearing}} if there are no nearby enemy champions.
** There is a very brief grace period after being seen or when entering combat. This can allow for multiple spells to inflict {{tip|fear}}.
* {{tip|Monster|Monsters}} are feared by '''Fiddlesticks's''' abilities when '''Fiddlesticks''' is out of combat, with some exceptions.
** If '''Fiddlesticks''' has recently damaged a monster from a camp with a basic attack or abilities (including {{si|Smite}} but not item active abilities), monsters in that camp will not be feared by his other abilities.
** {{ai|Bountiful Harvest|Fiddlesticks}} will not fear monsters unless '''Fiddlesticks''' is pretending to be an {{ai|A Harmless Scarecrow|Fiddlesticks|Effigy}} or is not visible to them.
** Scuttle crab's shield will prevent {{ai|Bountiful Harvest|Fiddlesticks}} and the edges of {{ai|Reap|Fiddlesticks}} from fearing it unless '''Fiddlesticks''' is not visible to it.
** Scuttle crab's shield will prevent {{ai|Crowstorm|Fiddlesticks}} from fearing it.
* The passive portion does not currently communicate any information to '''Fiddlesticks''', its allies nor its enemies. There is no indicator to say that '''Fiddlesticks''' is out of combat; and no indicator or debuff icon on affected enemies.
** A visual indicator will circle around all enemy champions while '''Fiddlesticks''' is channeling {{ai|Crowstorm|Fiddlesticks}} if it is unseen. This is only visible to '''Fiddlesticks'''.
* The fear immunity applies even if the target is {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immune}}. It is not applied if it is blocked by {{tip|spell shield}}.
* ''Terrify'' will still cast and affect the target even if '''Fiddlesticks''' dies or loses {{tip|sight}} of them during the cast time.
** ''Terrify'' will still cast but not affect the target if they die or become {{tip|untargetable}} during the cast time. There is no compensation.
* The [[summoner|player's]] screen will have a visual effect when successfully {{tip|flee|feared}} by ''Terrify''.
* [[File:Terrify Surprise Party.png|30px|border]] - {{csl|Fiddlesticks|Surprise Party}} has a special icon for this ability.
* {{ai|Crowstorm|Fiddlesticks}} will not fear enemy champions if cast while they have vision of '''Fiddlesticks''', even if '''Fiddlesticks''' is pretending to be an {{ai|A Harmless Scarecrow|Fiddlesticks|Effigy}}.

w1.name: Bountiful_Harvest
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Fiddlesticks''' forms a {{tip|tether}} between itself and each nearby enemy over the cast time, then {{tip|channel|channels}} for up to 2 seconds, harvesting the souls of tethered targets, {{tip|sight|revealing}} itself in the process.

While '''Fiddlesticks''' is channeling, tethered enemies are {{tip|true sight|revealed}} and dealt {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds, with the last tick dealing additional {{as|magic damage}}. ''Bountiful Harvest'' deals {{#var:monster_damage}}% damage against {{tip|monster|monsters}} and {{#var:minion_damage}}% damage against {{tip|minions|minions}}.

'''Fiddlesticks''' {{tip|heals}} itself for a percentage of the {{tt|pre-mitigation damage|Damage dealt before modifiers}} dealt, modified to {{#var:monster_heal}}% against monsters and {{#var:minion_heal}}% against minions.

''Bountiful Harvest'' ends if all targets have died or broken their tethers. If the channel was not {{tt|interrupted|e.g. by Fiddlesticks or crowd control effects}}, 60% of the remaining {{sti|cooldown}} is refunded.
''A nearby enemy is required to cast this ability. '''Fiddlesticks''' does not need {{tip|sight}} of a target to tether itself to them.''
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Fiddlesticks forms a tether between itself and each nearby enemy over the cast time, then channels for up to 2 seconds, harvesting the souls of tethered targets, revealing itself in the process.
While Fiddlesticks is channeling, tethered enemies are revealed and dealt magic damage every 0.25 seconds, with the last tick dealing additional magic damage. Bountiful Harvest deals Unknown value: #var:monster_damage% damage against monsters and Unknown value: #var:minion_damage% damage against minions.
Fiddlesticks heals itself for a percentage of the pre-mitigation damage dealt, modified to Unknown value: #var:monster_heal% against monsters and Unknown value: #var:minion_heal% against minions.
Bountiful Harvest ends if all targets have died or broken their tethers. If the channel was not interrupted, 60% of the remaining cooldown is refunded.
A nearby enemy is required to cast this ability. Fiddlesticks does not need sight of a target to tether itself to them.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage per Tick|{{ap|{{#var:min_base_damage}}*0.125 to {{#var:max_base_damage}}*0.125}} {{as|(+ {{fd|{{#expr:{{#var:ap_ratio}}/8}}}}% AP)}}|Last Tick of Damage|{{ap|{{#var:min_base_damage}}*0.125 to {{#var:max_base_damage}}*0.125}} {{as|(+ {{fd|{{#expr:{{#var:ap_ratio}}/8}}}}% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:min_execute_damage}} to {{#var:max_execute_damage}}}}% of target's '''missing''' health)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|{{#var:min_base_damage}} to {{#var:max_base_damage}}}} {{as|(+ {{#var:ap_ratio}}% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:min_execute_damage}} to {{#var:max_execute_damage}}}}% of target's '''missing''' health)}}}}

{{st|Champion Heal Percentage|{{ap|{{#var:min_champ_heal}} to {{#var:max_champ_heal}}}}%|Total Heal per Champion|{{ap|({{#var:min_base_damage}} to {{#var:max_base_damage}})*({{#var:min_champ_heal}} to {{#var:max_champ_heal}})/100}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:ap_ratio}}/100*({{#var:min_champ_heal}} to {{#var:max_champ_heal}})}}% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|({{#var:min_execute_damage}} to {{#var:max_execute_damage}})*({{#var:min_champ_heal}} to {{#var:max_champ_heal}})/100}}% of target's '''missing''' health)}}|Total Heal per Monster|{{ap|{{#var:min_base_damage}}*{{#var:monster_damage}}/100*{{#var:monster_heal}}/100 to {{#var:max_base_damage}}*{{#var:monster_damage}}/100*{{#var:monster_heal}}/100}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:ap_ratio}}*{{#var:monster_damage}}/100*{{#var:monster_heal}}/100}}% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:min_execute_damage}}*{{#var:monster_damage}}/100*{{#var:monster_heal}}/100 to {{#var:max_execute_damage}}*{{#var:monster_damage}}/100*{{#var:monster_heal}}/100}}% of target's '''missing''' health)}}|Total Heal per Minion|{{ap|{{#var:min_base_damage}}*{{#var:minion_damage}}/100*{{#var:minion_heal}}/100 to {{#var:max_base_damage}}*{{#var:minion_damage}}/100*{{#var:minion_heal}}/100}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:ap_ratio}}*{{#var:minion_damage}}/100*{{#var:minion_heal}}/100}}% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:min_execute_damage}}*{{#var:minion_damage}}/100*{{#var:minion_heal}}/100 to {{#var:max_execute_damage}}*{{#var:minion_damage}}/100*{{#var:minion_heal}}/100}}% of target's '''missing''' health)}}}}
w1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the tether's application but not the damage of one already applied.
* [[File:Bountiful Harvest Surprise Party.png|30px|border]] - {{csl|Fiddlesticks|Surprise Party}} has a special icon for this ability.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Fiddlesticks''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|attack=interrupts|cast=interrupts|move=interrupts|items=interrupts,true,,false|spells=true, interrupts, interrupts, interrupts, interrupts, interrupts, interrupts}}

e1.name: Reap
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Fiddlesticks''' slashes the target location with its scythe, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within the area and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for {{fd|1.25}} seconds.
Enemies hit in the center of the area are also {{tip|silence|silenced}} for {{fd|1.25}} seconds.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Fiddlesticks slashes the target location with its scythe, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area and slowing them for 1.25 seconds.
Enemies hit in the center of the area are also silenced for 1.25 seconds.
e1.notes: * [[File:Reap Surprise Party.png|30px|border]] - {{csl|Fiddlesticks|Surprise Party}} has a special icon for this ability.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 50% AP)
  • Slow: %

r1.name: Crowstorm
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Fiddlesticks''' {{tip|channel|channels}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, then {{tip|blink|blinks}} to the target location upon completion with a murder of crows flying wildly around it for 5 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds to nearby enemies.
''Crowstorm will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Fiddlesticks channels for 1.5 seconds, then blinks to the target location upon completion with a murder of crows flying wildly around it for 5 seconds, dealing magic damage every 0.25 seconds to nearby enemies.
Crowstorm will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage per Tick|{{ap|125*0.25 to 325*0.25}} {{as|(+ {{fd|11.25}}% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|125*5 to 325*5}} {{as|(+ 225% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
* {{tip|Root|Roots}} do not {{tip|interrupt}} the ability despite being a [[Channel#Movement Channels|movement channel]].
* '''Fiddlesticks''' will always {{tip|blink}} to its intended location even if its position changes during the {{tip|channel}} without being interrupted (e.g. by {{ai|Realm Warp|Ryze}}).
* [[File:Crowstorm Surprise Party.png|30px|border]] - {{csl|Fiddlesticks|Surprise Party}} has a special icon for this ability.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Fiddlesticks''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|attack=false|cast=false|move=false|items=false, true|spells=true, false, false, false, false|interrupts=death, silence, ground}}
